downloadTitle: Working on tasks in Project Web App: A guide for team members
downloadDescription: This guide is designed to help team members learn how to use Project Web App for timesheets and task progress.
detailsSection: This guide is designed to help team members learn how to use Project Web App for timesheets and task progress.
systemRequirementsSection:
The file is available as both an Adobe Reader file and a Microsoft Word document.
  • Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.
  • Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
